publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3572 Hugh Henry: Access to Small Claims—That the Parliament notes Ian Hamilton’s claim of negligence against the Royal Bank of Scotland; regrets the decision by Sheriff Simon Pender that prevents Ian Hamilton from pursuing his case in the small claims court; believes that this prevents ordinary people from pursuing legitimate claims at reasonable expense, and calls for a review of procedures to allow such claims to be heard in the small claims court.
S3M-3572 Access to Small Claims (lodged on 27 February 2009) Patricia Ferguson*, Sandra White*, Elaine Murray*, Bill Kidd*, Karen Whitefield*, James Kelly*, Mike Pringle*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3572 Access to Small Claims (lodged on 27 February 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3572 Access to Small Claims (lodged on 27 February 2009) Maureen Watt*
S3M-3572 Access to Small Claims (lodged on 27 February 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*, Rhoda Grant*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-3572 Access to Small Claims (lodged on 27 February 2009) Tom McCabe*
S3M-3572 Access to Small Claims (lodged on 27 February 2009) Cathy Peattie*
